title: $:/plugins/tobibeer/count
description: A filter to count titles or compare against a specified count
author: Tobias Beer
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/tobibeer/count/filter.js": { "text": "/*\ title: $:/plugins/tobibeer/count/filter.js type: application/javascript module-type: filteroperator a filter to count input titles or check a the count to be of a given value @preserve \*/ (function(){"use strict";exports.count=function(e,t,r){try{var i,s,n,a,o=["eq","neq","lt","lte","gt","gte","is"],c=[],f=t.operand,l=parseInt(f),u=!isNaN(l),p=t.prefix==="!";$tw.utils.each((t.suffix||"").toLowerCase().split(" "),function(e){e=e.trim();if(e){if(e==="$"){i=1}else{n=e}}});if(n&&o.indexOf(n)<0){throw"invalid comparison `"+n+"`, try any of: "+o}else if(!n&&u){n="eq"}else if(n&&!f){l=0;u=1}if(f&&!u){throw"operand `"+f+"` is not a number"}e(function(e,t){c.push(t)});s=c.length;if(n){switch(n){case"eq":case"is":a=s===l;break;case"neq":a=s!==l;break;case"lt":a=sl;break;case"gte":a=s>=l;break}if(a&&!p||!a&&p){c=i?c:[s.toString()]}else{c=[]}}else{c=[s.toString()]}return c}catch(b){return["count filter error: "+b]}}})();", "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/count/filter.js", "type": "application/javascript", "module-type": "filteroperator" }, "$:/plugins/tobibeer/count/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/count/readme", "text": "The plugin $:/plugins/tobibeer/count provides: ; count[] : a filter to count input titles or compare the count against a number specified in the operand
; documentation / examples / demos... : http://tobibeer.github.io/tw5-plugins#count !! Syntax ; `count[]` : simply count input titles ; `count[]` : count and return if equal to `` ; `count:$[]` : count and return input titles if count equals `` ; `count:gt[]` : count and return count if greater than `` : compare using any of: `eq` (default), `neq`, `gt`, `gte`, `lt`, `lte` ; `count:$ gt[]` : count and returns input titles if count greater than ``" } } }
